attributes.title: Cotton t-shirt (organic)
attributes.description:
Approximately 300 t-shirts are ready for distribution from Columbia, South Carolina to YOU!

ORDER your t-shirt here:
www.laurakissel.com/cotton_road.html

POST in the comments section below where your shirt ended up and we'll PIN this map to reveal the environmental impact of sending the shirt to you.

attributes.title: Los Angeles, CA
attributes.description: Karis is wearing her shirt in LA.
SIX t-shirts were delivered by plane from Columbia, SC to Shanghai, China in November 2012. I traveled here to screen select scenes from Cotton Road at Zhejiang University and Fudan University.
attributes.title: Six cotton t-shirts to Shanghai, China
